reward: Party leader gets to pick any available CO-OP game.
punishment: Party leader deletes 4 HCMC probabilities. No CO-OP game will be picked this week.
description: Swarm

reward: Party leader gets to pick any available CO-OP game. Player also gains 50 ducats.
punishment: {Dagon‚Äôs Curse} Remove all fish from the menu this week. One CoOp day becomes a deep clean fish tank day. Party leader deletes 4 HCMC probabilities. No CO-OP game will be picked this week.
description: STRENGTH

reward: Party leader gets to pick any available CO-OP game. Player also gains 50 ducats.
punishment: {Hypnopompia} If the Party leader is the current Bingwa and or Atletico champ, remove your title and swap with the Kushindwa and or Atletico loser. All choices stay the same but all other rewards go to other player. Party leader deletes 4 HCMC probabilities. No CO-OP game will be picked this week.
description: INTELLINGENCE

reward: Party leader gets to pick any available CO-OP game. Player also gains 50 ducats.
punishment: {Borracho} Each party member must play on level above the Gig Game requirement during the next weekly Rockband session. Party leader deletes 4 HCMC probabilities. No CO-OP game will be picked this week.
description: PERCEPTION

reward: Party leader gets to pick any available CO-OP game. Player also gains 50 ducats.
punishment: {Vegicide} Each party member must pick one day this week to abstain from meat consumption. Party leader deletes 4 HCMC probabilities. No CO-OP game will be picked this week.
description: CONSTITUTION

Your mortal life has been judged sinful, and your soul‚Äôs fate is to be punished for all eternity ‚Äì but an uprising is brewing among the damned! Press on as a renegade in the immortal rebellion against God‚Äôs final judgment, and fight for your eternal life.
When one man is not enough, it will take an army of two to fight through war and a conspiracy so vast it threatens the entire world.

Starting in 1998 with a robbery-gone-wrong in small town Arizona, the choices you make have a powerful impact on the characters‚Äô lives in this uncompromising story of betrayal, sacrifice and resilience.

genre: Fighting, Platform, Hack and slash, Adventure
description: battletoads is a genre-defying tale of three unlikely heroes as they fight to save their galaxy from a deadly warlord. The game is a reboot of the original Battletoads game series, which was developed by Rare and published by Tradewest. The game features beat 'em up, platforming, and racing gameplay.

When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force. Brace your loins with up to four players to run ‚Äòn‚Äô gun as dozens of different bros and eliminate the opposing terrorist forces that threaten our way of life. Unleash scores of unique weapons and set off incredible chain reactions of fire, napalm, and limbs in the name of freedom.

Brothers is a tale of two sons, a story of grief, exploration, and the unshakable bond between siblings. Guide two brothers on an epic fairy tale journey using innovative controls to solve puzzles, explore stunning locations and face off against harrowing boss fights.

Chariot is a couch co- platformer that can be played alone or with a friend. Players guide a chariot through underground caves using physics-based mechanics such as pushing, pulling, riding and swinging.

A community survival game where you build a self-sustaining home with your neighbors. Design and automate production lines, farm your own food, and take care of your community's needs as you work together to restore an abandoned factory.

Darksiders Genesis is an action/adventure game that tears its way through Hell and back with guns blazing and swords swinging. Genesis gives players their first look at the world of Darksiders before the events of the original game.

The post-soviet country of Chernarus is struck by an unknown virus, turning the majority population into frenzied infected. Fighting over resources has bred a hostile mentality among survivors, driving what's left of humanity to collapse. You are one of the few immune to the virus - how far will you go to survive?

Work together as a team of badass space mining dwarves facing hostile alien environments with endless hordes of monsters and connecting caves! Dig tunnels, gather resources, find your way through the procedurally generated cave systems and battle constant alien threats!

No one can stop death. The Prime Evil rages within the Black Soulstone, its essence screaming for vengeance and release. Before the artifact can be sealed away forever, Malthael‚ÄìAngel of Death‚Äìmanifests in the mortal realms with a deadly new purpose: to steal the Black Soulstone and bend its infernal power to his will.

As the battle between the High Heavens and Burning Hells rages on, hatred devours Sanctuary as evil spreads and a new wave of cultists and worshippers arise to embrace Lilith‚Äôs coming. Only a brave few dare to face this threat and bring light to the all-consuming darkness.

The Divine is dead. The Void approaches. And the powers lying dormant within you are soon to awaken. The battle for Divinity has begun. Choose wisely and trust sparingly; darkness lurks within every heart.

A 4X real-time strategy game from the developers of Northgard. Set in Frank Herbert's groundbreaking Dune universe, you must lead your faction and battle for control and dominance over the harsh desert planet of Arrakis.

Endless Dungeon is a rogue-lite tactical action game, set in the award-winning Endless universe. Recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, head into a long-abandoned space station, and protect your crystal against endless waves of monsters.

ExoPrimal is a multiplayer team-based action game pitting humanity's cutting-edge exosuit technology against history's most ferocious dinosaurs. Put your combat skills to the test in online-only team-based action!
Twenty-five years after the bombs fell, you and your fellow Vault Dwellers emerge into post-nuclear America. Explore a vast wasteland in this multiplayer addition to the Fallout story.
Designed especially for adults. This rewarding project for adults includes 878 pieces, creating a beautiful display piece measuring over 7 in. (18 cm) high.

Guardian Heroes is a 2D side-scrolling beat 'em up video game with RPG elements developed by Treasure and released in 1996 for the Sega Saturn. A band of young adventurers begin a quest to change the fate of their kingdom after an enchanted sword falls into their hands. Players may choose between four characters, each with their own unique fighting style, and embark on many different paths in the game's story mode. The game also includes a special versus mode wherein up to six players can compete against each other in arena combat.

Monaco: What's Yours Is Mine (or simply Monaco') is a video game made by indie developers at Pocketwatch Games. They are best known for winning the 2010 IGF Award in 2010 for their work on Monaco. The game was released for Windows on April 24, 2013, via Steam, and will be released for the Mac and XBLA platforms in 2013.

text: New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe (2019)
description: Simple, straightforward controls, new playable characters optimized for younger and less-experienced players, and a wealth of bonus content--like a Hints gallery and helpful reference videos**--make this a perfect choice for anyone looking to introduce their family to the wonderful world of Mario.
Experience an explosive game of cat and mouse set in a vast open world. In this reimagining of 1980s Sweden, hostile machines have invaded the serene countryside, and you need to fight back!

In Grounded, you have been shrunken to the size of an ant and must survive in a dangerous backyard. Craft tools and shelter while exploring, gathering resources and fighting for survival alone or with up to three other players.

text: How to survive 2: Storm warning edition

description: Human: Fall Flat is a quirky, open-ended physics-based puzzle platform adventure. Your goal is to escape dreamlands by solving puzzles with nothing but your wits and physics.

ilomilo is a puzzle game where you play as ilo and milo, two friends who like to meet every day for tea. However, their favorite meeting place is quite unusual, and the path to find each other is always different.
Embark on the craziest journey of your life in It Takes Two. Invite a friend to join for free with Friend's Pass and work together across a huge variety of gleefully disruptive gameplay challenges.

A co- action adventure game about friendship, imagination, and riding bikes around a British island in the 1980s. Play as Nessa & Demelza - exploring, solving puzzles, battling bad guys, and customizing your bikes!
Livelock is a cooperative top-down shooter where you play as a Capital Intellect, a human consciousness uploaded to a mechanical body to protect humanity's last hope for survival.

Explore a colorful galaxy in a massive neon battleship that you control together with up to 4 players. Each player pilots a different ship system, requiring teamwork to survive and find lost space-bunnies!

Marvel Ultimate Alliance is an action role-playing game featuring over 22 playable characters from the Marvel Universe. Players can create their own team of heroes and engage in both story-driven and non-linear gameplay.

text: Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3: The Black Order

description: Fight your way through an all-new action-adventure game, inspired by classic dungeon crawlers and set in the Minecraft universe! Up to four players can team up and fight together in local and online co-.

Rise to the challenge and join the hunt! Monster Hunter Rise is the latest installment in the action RPG series, delivering a mix of classic elements and unique new mechanics for both solo and multiplayer gameplay.

Out of Space is a co- game about living together in space. Clean up, furnish and maintain a house in space while dealing with alien goo and doing chores to survive your daily space-life with your friends.

OUTRIDERS is a 1-3 player co- RPG shooter set in an original, dark and desperate sci-fi universe. As mankind bleeds out in the trenches of Enoch, you'll create your own Outrider and embark on a journey across the hostile planet.

Overcooked is a chaotic couch co- cooking game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your fellow chefs must prepare, cook and serve up a variety of tasty orders before the baying customers storm out.

Palworld is a multiplayer survival crafting game where you can collect mysterious creatures called 'Pals'. Build facilities, fight alongside your Pals, and experience a completely new type of survival game!
PAYDAY 2 is an action-packed, four-player co- shooter where you rob banks and get paid. The Crimewave edition includes all DLC and enhanced features.
PlateUp! is a roguelite management game where you run a restaurant with your friends. Design your kitchen, cook delicious recipes, and serve hungry customers in this challenging co- experience.
Portal 2 draws from the award-winning formula of innovative gameplay, story, and music that earned the original Portal over 70 industry accolades and created a cult following.

America, 1899. Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are outlaws on the run. With federal agents and the best bounty hunters in the nation massing on their heels, the gang must rob, steal and fight their way across the rugged heartland of America in order to survive.

The island town of Redfall, Massachusetts, is under siege by a legion of vampires who have cut off the island from the outside world. Trapped with a handful of survivors, choose from a roster of heroes and squad up to create the perfect team of vampire slayers.

The beginning of the Resident Evil Revelations 2 tale sees fan favorite Claire Redfield make a dramatic return. Survivor of the Raccoon City incident depicted in previous Resident Evil games, Claire now works for the anti-bioterrorism organization Terra Save.
A shared-world action-adventure game that lets you be the pirate you've always dreamed of in a vast, fantastical world filled with treasure, mystery and fearsome enemies.

The dead have risen and civilization has fallen. Not even the military could stop the zombies, and now it's up to you to gather survivors and build a community in a post-apocalyptic world ‚Äì a world where every decision matters, and where you define what it means to survive.

Take the role of a plane crash survivor stranded in the Pacific Ocean. CoOpme face to face with some of the most life threatening scenarios in a procedurally generated world. Explore underwater and island environments as you hunt for supplies to craft the tools, weapons, and shelter you'll need to stay alive.
The all-time classic Streets of Rage, known as Bare Knuckle in Japan, is a beat 'em up series known for this timeless gameplay and electronic dance influenced music.
Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game. Join the adventure in this 2D sandbox game where the world is your canvas and the ground itself is your paint.

Tetris Effect: CoOpnnected adds all-new co- and competitive online and local multiplayer modes to the original game, including Zone Battle, a one-on-one battle of cascading line clears and remote games.
The Ascent is a solo and co- Action-shooter RPG set in a cyberpunk world. The mega corporation that owns you and everyone, The Ascent Group, has just collapsed. Can you survive without it?
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge features groundbreaking gameplay rooted in timeless classic brawling mechanics, brought to you by the beat 'em up experts at Dotemu and Tribute Games.

When you cut ties to the past, new bonds form. In Unravel Two, create a Yarny of your very own. Then build relationships with other Yarnys in local co- or as a single player, fostering friendship and support as you journey together.

A brutal exploration and survival game for 1-10 players, set in a procedurally-generated purgatory inspired by viking culture. Battle, build, and conquer your way to a saga worthy of Odin's patronage!
Vampire Survivors is a gothic horror casual game with roguelite elements. Fight against continuous waves of monsters and survive until the timer runs out while collecting items and powering up!
Warframe is a free-to-play cooperative third-person shooter set in an evolving sci-fi world. Join your friends in player-vs-enemy raids across the solar system and master the power of the Warframes.

A game about keeping a warehouse running in tip-top shape. You play as Wilmot, a hard working warehouse employee tasked with organizing and storing everything that arrives. Work with a friend in local co- to manage your warehouse efficiently!

ZHEROS is a next gen beat'em up based on combat and action. Fight against armies of robots and bizarre creatures either alone or in co- mode. Face challenging enemies, upgrade your combat skills and discover new ways to eliminate your foes!

Hitler's hordes are back for more in this spine-chilling shooter from the makers of Sniper Elite 4! Abominable occult enemies, epic weapons and a harrowing new campaign for 1-4 players await in 1940s Europe, as you fight to save humankind from undead Armageddon!
